list.name: device
list.query: SELECT device_id FROM devices ORDER BY device_id

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM devices
SELECT COUNT(*) as online FROM devices WHERE last_seen > NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes'
SELECT COUNT(*) as uptodate FROM devices d WHERE d.current_firmware_version = (SELECT version FROM firmware_releases fr WHERE fr.device_model = d.device_model ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1)
SELECT device_model || ': ' || version as latest FROM firmware_releases ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM edge_device_status WHERE ts > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'

WITH latest_status AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_id)
    device_id,
    status,
    ts as last_status_ts
  FROM edge_device_status
  ORDER BY device_id, ts DESC
),
latest_update AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_id)
    device_id,
    firmware_version as target_version,
    status as update_status,
    completed_at
  FROM device_update_status
  ORDER BY device_id, started_at DESC
)
SELECT
  d.device_id as "Device ID",
  d.device_model as "Model",
  d.current_firmware_version as "Current FW",
  (
    SELECT version FROM firmware_releases fr
    WHERE fr.device_model = d.device_model
    ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
  ) as "Latest FW",
  CASE
    WHEN d.last_seen > NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes' THEN 'ðŸŸ¢ Online'
    WHEN d.last_seen > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour' THEN 'ðŸŸ¡ Recent'
    ELSE 'ðŸ”´ Offline'
  END as "Status",
  CASE
    WHEN d.last_seen > NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes' THEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - d.last_seen))::int || 's ago'
    WHEN d.last_seen > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour' THEN ROUND(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - d.last_seen))/60)::int || 'm ago'
    WHEN d.last_seen IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(d.last_seen, 'MM-DD HH24:MI')
    ELSE 'Never'
  END as "Last Seen",
  CASE
    WHEN ls.last_status_ts > NOW() - INTERVAL '10 minutes' THEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ls.last_status_ts))::int || 's ago'
    WHEN ls.last_status_ts > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour' THEN ROUND(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ls.last_status_ts))/60)::int || 'm ago'
    WHEN ls.last_status_ts IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(ls.last_status_ts, 'MM-DD HH24:MI')
    ELSE 'No data'
  END as "Last Status",
  COALESCE((ls.status->>'signal_strength_dbm')::text, '-') as "WiFi (dBm)",
  CASE
    WHEN (ls.status->>'uptime_seconds')::numeric >= 86400 THEN ((ls.status->>'uptime_seconds')::numeric / 86400)::int || 'd'
    WHEN (ls.status->>'uptime_seconds')::numeric >= 3600 THEN ((ls.status->>'uptime_seconds')::numeric / 3600)::int || 'h'
    WHEN (ls.status->>'uptime_seconds')::numeric >= 60 THEN ((ls.status->>'uptime_seconds')::numeric / 60)::int || 'm'
    WHEN ls.status->>'uptime_seconds' IS NOT NULL THEN (ls.status->>'uptime_seconds')::int || 's'
    ELSE '-'
  END as "Uptime",
  COALESCE(ls.status->>'state', '-') as "State",
  CASE
    WHEN lu.update_status IN ('downloading', 'installing', 'pending') THEN 'ðŸ”„ Updating'
    WHEN lu.update_status = 'success' THEN 'âœ… Success'
    WHEN lu.update_status = 'failed' THEN 'âŒ Failed'
    ELSE '-'
  END as "Update Status",
  TO_CHAR(d.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "Registered"
FROM devices d
LEFT JOIN latest_status ls ON d.device_id = ls.device_id
LEFT JOIN latest_update lu ON d.device_id = lu.device_id
WHERE d.device_id ~ '${device}'
ORDER BY d.last_seen DESC NULLS LAST

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('minute', ts) - (EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM ts)::int % 5) * INTERVAL '1 minute' as time,
  device_id,
  COUNT(*) as messages
FROM edge_device_status
WHERE
  ts > $__timeFrom()
  AND ts < $__timeTo()
  AND device_id ~ '${device}'
GROUP BY time, device_id
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  ts as time,
  device_id,
  (status->>'signal_strength_dbm')::numeric as rssi
FROM edge_device_status
WHERE
  status ? 'signal_strength_dbm'
  AND ts > $__timeFrom()
  AND ts < $__timeTo()
  AND device_id ~ '${device}'
ORDER BY ts

SELECT
  TO_CHAR(ts, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "Timestamp",
  device_id as "Device",
  COALESCE(status->>'state', '-') as "State",
  COALESCE((status->>'signal_strength_dbm')::text, '-') as "WiFi (dBm)",
  CASE
    WHEN (status->>'uptime_seconds')::numeric >= 3600 THEN ((status->>'uptime_seconds')::numeric / 3600)::int || 'h'
    WHEN (status->>'uptime_seconds')::numeric >= 60 THEN ((status->>'uptime_seconds')::numeric / 60)::int || 'm'
    WHEN status->>'uptime_seconds' IS NOT NULL THEN (status->>'uptime_seconds')::int || 's'
    ELSE '-'
  END as "Uptime",
  COALESCE(status->>'firmware_version', '-') as "FW Ver",
  COALESCE(status->>'heater_status'::text, '-') as "Heater",
  COALESCE(status->>'active_scenario', '-') as "Scenario"
FROM edge_device_status
WHERE
  device_id ~ '${device}'
ORDER BY ts DESC
LIMIT 50

SELECT
  TO_CHAR(dus.started_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "Started",
  dus.device_id as "Device",
  dus.firmware_version as "Target Version",
  CASE
    WHEN dus.status = 'success' THEN 'âœ… Success'
    WHEN dus.status = 'failed' THEN 'âŒ Failed'
    WHEN dus.status IN ('downloading', 'installing', 'pending') THEN 'ðŸ”„ In Progress'
    ELSE dus.status
  END as "Status",
  CASE
    WHEN dus.completed_at IS NOT NULL THEN
      ROUND(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (dus.completed_at - dus.started_at))::numeric, 0) || 's'
    ELSE 'Ongoing'
  END as "Duration",
  COALESCE(
    CASE
      WHEN LENGTH(dus.error_message) > 50 THEN LEFT(dus.error_message, 50) || '...'
      ELSE dus.error_message
    END,
    '-'
  ) as "Message"
FROM device_update_status dus
WHERE dus.device_id ~ '${device}'
ORDER BY dus.started_at DESC
LIMIT 30

SELECT
  ts as time,
  device_id,
  (status->>'uptime_seconds')::numeric / 3600 as uptime_hours
FROM edge_device_status
WHERE
  status ? 'uptime_seconds'
  AND ts > $__timeFrom()
  AND ts < $__timeTo()
  AND device_id ~ '${device}'
ORDER BY ts

WITH latest_status AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_id)
    device_id,
    status->>'state' as state,
    status->>'active_scenario' as scenario
  FROM edge_device_status
  WHERE device_id ~ '${device}'
  ORDER BY device_id, ts DESC
)
SELECT
  device_id,
  COALESCE(state, 'unknown') || ' (' || COALESCE(scenario, 'default') || ')' as current_state
FROM latest_status

WITH latest_uptime AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_id)
    device_id,
    (status->>'uptime_seconds')::numeric as uptime_seconds
  FROM edge_device_status
  WHERE
    status ? 'uptime_seconds'
    AND device_id ~ '${device}'
  ORDER BY device_id, ts DESC
)
SELECT
  device_id,
  CASE
    WHEN uptime_seconds >= 86400 THEN (uptime_seconds / 86400)::int || 'd ' || ((uptime_seconds % 86400) / 3600)::int || 'h'
    WHEN uptime_seconds >= 3600 THEN (uptime_seconds / 3600)::int || 'h ' || ((uptime_seconds % 3600) / 60)::int || 'm'
    WHEN uptime_seconds >= 60 THEN (uptime_seconds / 60)::int || 'm'
    ELSE uptime_seconds::int || 's'
  END as uptime
FROM latest_uptime
